cause.description:
Love is thrown around and it is starting to make people not to believe in it anymore. that can not happen. there is such a feeling.....you just have to believe and keep hoping that you will find it. if you have found it and it hurt you....believe that you will find it again!!!! Never Give Up Hope!!!!!!
1. people must believe in LOVE.
2. Love hurts sometimes but you have to believe that there is still ove out there for you.
cause.mission: have people not give up on love and o believe that there is such a feeling out there for someone
cause.name: Do You Believe In Love
